articles.title: Congratulations to President of Kazakhstan
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Kazakhstan
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Nursultan Nazarbayev upon his reelection as president of the Republic of Kazakhstan. 
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Kazakhstan would grow stronger in conformity with the desire and aspiration of the peoples of the two countries and sincerely wished the president greater success in his responsible work for the country's prosperity and its people's well-being.

articles.title: Japanese PM Accused of His Reckless Remarks to Cover up Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japanese PM Accused of His Reckless Remarks to Cover up Past Crimes
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Wednesday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards Japanese Prime Minister Abe's crafty behavior to cover up Japan's past crimes while insulting the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army:
					 Abe on his trip to the U.S. termed sexual slaves "victims of flesh traffic" in a recent lecture and at a press conference he let loose a spate of reckless remarks asserting that sexual slaves were results of flesh traffic.
					
					 What Abe uttered was an intolerable insult to the victims.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the sexual slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army were victims of the sexual slavery systematically enforced by militarist Japan by force, not victims of flesh traffic.
					
					 The hideous crimes committed by Japan against humanity during its occupation of Korea and World War II are stark historical facts that can neither be concealed nor be covered up.
					
					 Abe and other Japanese right-wing conservative forces are working hard to totally negate their past crimes and evade responsibility for them through such crafty wordplay. This can be done only by hooligans devoid of morality and human conscience and psychopath bereft of elementary normal sense.
					
					  Abe's reckless remarks that shielded the hideous crimes against humanity in disregard of the international community strongly urging Japan to make an apology and reparation for its past crimes including the issue of sexual slavery vividly showed the moral vulgarity and impudence of Japan.
					
					 Abe reportedly said Japan would donate funds to the UN for the protection of women's rights. This is also a base act of making mockery of mankind as it means bargaining on inviolable human rights with a petty amount of money.
					
					 If the Japanese authorities persist in putting under the carpet the past crime-woven history of Japan and repeating it, it will never escape destruction more shameful than its defeat in the past war.
					
					 The Abe-led Japanese authorities should drop their anachronistic way of thinking and honestly admit and apologize and make reparation for all the inhuman crimes including the sexual slavery as demanded by the international community.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Holds U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Regime Chiefly Responsible for Nuclear Proliferation
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Holds U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Regime Chiefly Responsible for Nuclear Proliferation
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime concluded their negotiations on amending the "atomic energy agreement" which have been under way since 2010 and initialed the proposal for its amendment.
					 The amendment will help the puppet regime more frantically step up the moves for developing nukes while ever more undisguisedly reprocessing spent nuclear fuel and enriching uranium which have been done so far in secrecy with the backing of the U.S.
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in its bulletin No. 1092 Wednesday terms this a dangerous criminal move which will escalate tension on the Korean peninsula and spark off nuclear proliferation and nuclear arms race in Northeast Asia.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. had already concluded the deceptive "atomic energy agreement" with the south Korean regime in the 1950s. Since then it has connived at and patronized the latter's nuclear development under the signboard of "controlling nukes."
					
					 Under the "south Korea-U.S. sci-tech agreement", the U.S. has systematically transferred the technologies applicable to the development of nuclear weapons to the puppet regime and has now gone the lengths of enabling it to enrich uranium, reprocess and recycle spent nuclear fuel.
					
					 Consequently, the U.S. has fully revealed its true colors as the chief culprit of nuclear proliferation after throwing off the mask it has worn for years to systematically transfer sensitive technologies, manpower and equipment necessary for nuclear development to the puppet regime behind the scene.
					
					 It is shameless, indeed, for the U.S. to take issue with someone's nukes and express "concern over nuclear proliferation".
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime has now neither justification nor excuse to pull up the DPRK over its nukes nor can they evade their responsibility as the chief culprits of nuclear proliferation and nuclear arms race.
					
					 The DPRK will further bolster up its self-defensive nuclear deterrent for defending the dignity of the nation, its sovereignty and global peace and security to cope with the reckless nuclear hysteria of the U.S. and the puppet regime.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Brazil Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Brazil Appointed 
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Chol Hak was appointed DPRK ambassador to the Federative Republic of Brazil, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Reception Give at Polish Embassy
articles.content:
Reception Give at Polish Embassy
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Polish embassy here gave a reception on Wednesday on the occasion of the Constitution Day, the national day of Poland.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Krzysztof Ciebien and his embassy officials were present.

articles.title: Reception Given by Indonesian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Indonesian Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Bambang Hiendrasto gave a reception on Wednesday on the occasions of the 50th anniversary of the Indonesia visit by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the 50th anniversary of the naming of a beautiful flower Kimilsungia.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador said in a speech that the Indonesia visit by the President and Kim Jong Il and the naming of immortal flower Kimilsungia marked a special occasion in the history of development of bilateral friendly relations.
					
					 He praised the immortal feats the preceding leaders of the two countries performed by providing the friendly relations between the Republic of Indonesia and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 He expressed belief that the two countries would boost bilateral cooperation and support in various fields.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said that the Indonesia visit by the President and Kim Jong Il was a historic one as it provided a solid foundation for the development of the bilateral relations of friendship.
					
					 Immortal flower Kimilsungia is now in full bloom as a symbol of the friendship between the two countries and a flower praising the great man in reflection of the boundless reverence of the world progressives for the President, he noted.
					
					 He said that the DPRK would as ever make positive efforts to dynamically boost the friendly relations with Indonesia on a higher level in conformity with the common desire of the two peoples.

articles.title: Performances Given by Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Performances Given by Moranbong Band
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Performances were given by the Moranbong Band at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday and Tuesday for the participants in the Fifth Conference of Training Officers of the Korean People's Army.
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as female chorus "The Glorious Motherland", light music "Pyongyang Is Best" and female solo and pangchang "My Mind".
					
					 The performers represented the people's boundless yearning and thanks to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who started the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche and led it to victory, paving a wide avenue to prosperity of the country.
					
					 They truthfully represented the highest honor and greatest happiness of having the great leaders in high esteem, warm love for the country and the firm resolution of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to glorify the socialist country of Juche for all ages.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers reflecting the steadfast will of the service personnel to lead a worthy life in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, regarding as their maxim the faith of certain victory of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners who won victory by waging a death-defying fight for our country and nation, pulling through all difficulties.
					
					 Among the audience were Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil and other commanding officers of the KPA and the participants in the conference.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting at the Central Hall of Workers on Wednesday to mark the 30th anniversary of publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Strengthening Party Guidance in the Activities of the Working People's Organizations".
					 The work, published on Apr. 30, Juche 74 (1985), deals with the basic issues of building up the working people's organizations into militant organizations and reliable helpers remaining loyal to the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, party officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, districts, organs, enterprises, factories and farms in the city and teachers and students of the party cadre training institutions.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae said in a report that busy as Kim Jong Il was steering all affairs related to the revolution and construction, he energetically led the party organizations to strengthen their leadership over the working people's organizations so that they might successfully perform their mission and duty for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the Songun revolutionary cause.
					
					 His leadership is being given steady continuity thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un and the work of the working people's organizations is greeting a new heyday of their development, the reporter noted. 
					
					 He underlined the need to steadily strengthen party leadership over the working people's organizations as required by the times and the developing revolution and thus firmly uphold the feats Kim Jong Il performed in the history of the building of working people's organizations and add brilliance to them.

articles.title: 1st Round of Premier League Football Matches Ends
articles.content:
1st Round of Premier League Football Matches Ends
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The first round of the premier league football matches of Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games recently came to a close in the DPRK.
					 The matches continued for nearly one month, drawing deep attention of sports fans and citizens.
					
					 The men footballers of Rimyongsu Sports Team and women footballers of Sobaeksu Sports Team took the first place at the first round respectively.
					
					 The Rimyongsu men's football team defeated its rivals of Sonbong Sports Team 2:1 at the semi-finals and those of Kikwancha Sports Team 1:0 at the final. And the Sobaeksu women's football team edged out its rivals of Amnokgang Sports Team and April 25 Sports Team by 3:2 and 1:0 at the semi-finals and the final.
					
					 The second round of premier league football matches will take place in May.

articles.title: National Festival of Science and Technology Closes
articles.content:
National Festival of Science and Technology Closes
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The 30th National Festival of Science and Technology closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Wednesday.
					 Presented to the festival were more than 550 achievements made in scientific researches and technological innovations including proposals for developing agriculture, stock breeding and fishery and putting equipment and production processes on a CNC and unmanned basis with locally available resources and indigenous technologies and products based on latest technology.
					
					 Highly estimated at the festival were scientists and technicians of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the 618 Cement Factory and other units.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Choe Sang Gon, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, and others.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the State Academy of Sciences and three other units took special places while the Academy of Agricultural Science, the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, the Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory and 32 other units placed first.

articles.title: Production of Consumer Goods on Steady Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Production of Consumer Goods on Steady Increase in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- An upsurge has been effected in the production of light industrial factories of the DPRK.
					 Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill is taking the lead in increasing the production. At the mill, 11 weavers overfulfilled their yearly quotas and 120 weavers their first half-yearly quotas.
					
					 Production increase has also been witnessed in many mills and factories like the Sinuiju Textile Mill, the September Textile Mill, the Hamhung Knitwear Factory, the Songyo Knitwear Factory and the Sinuiju Unha Towel Factory.
					
					 Meanwhile, foodstuff factories in different parts of the country have made all efforts to increase production, thus making contributions to improving the people's standard of living.

articles.title: New Kind of Ceramic Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Ceramic Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Nano Materials Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has developed a new kind of ceramic. 
					 Its serviceable life doubles that of other ceramics and it has the advantages of keeping itself always clean with rainwater and purifying air.
					
					 It is possible to produce it through existing production processes.
					
					 The newly developed ceramic is getting popular for its special characteristics friendly to environmental protection.

articles.title: Retinal Surgery Proves Successful in DPRK
articles.content:
Retinal Surgery Proves Successful in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Ophthalmic Hospital in the DPRK has made a signal success in treatment of retinal disease by applying a new surgery.
					 In this regard, Kim Man Sok, section chief of the hospital, told KCNA:
					
					 Though the hospital was opened 10 years ago, it was well known throughout the country for treatment of eye diseases.
					
					 We have applied a new surgery to treating retinal diseases, curing more than 300 people of different symptoms.
					
					 Pang Hye Suk living in Musan County, North Hamgyong Province said:
					
					 My sight was restored after receiving treatment at the hospital.
					
					 I was deeply impressed by the sincerity shown to me by its doctors.
					
					 Kim Chung Hyok living in Samma-dong No.1 in Tongdaewon District, Pyongyang said:
					
					 I underwent a surgery at the hospital, thanks to the free medical care system of my country. To pay for this, I will devote myself to adding glory to my country.
					
					 Ryu Un Hui, president of the hospital, said:
					
					 The hospital has made a big stride in medical service by applying a wave of latest medical successes to clinical practices.

articles.title: New Kind of Feed Additive for Livestock Developed
articles.content:
New Kind of Feed Additive for Livestock Developed 
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A new kind of feed additive for livestock was developed by the Microbiological Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK.
					 The additive makes it possible to ferment different species of grasses and thus remarkably reduce the consumption of grain feed.
					
					 According to Kim Mun Chol, director of the institute, the additive is highly capable of dissolving fiber.
					
					 It also helps raise the absorption rate of grain feed and sharply cut down the cost for raising livestock.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Kim Jong Il's Behests
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Kim Jong Il's Behests
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Victory and prosperity of the great Paektusan nation depend on how to implement the behests of leader Kim Jong Il, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have adorned every year of the new century of Juche with heroic epic to be specially recorded in the history of the nation by doing everything as taught by Kim Jong Il and directing all efforts to the drive for carrying out his behests over the past three years.
					
					 The three years marked a period of single-minded unity when the Workers' Party of Korea and the army and people have steadily carried forward the tradition of Mt. Paektu, the lifeline of the Juche revolution, true to his behests, and a proud period in which they carried forward the tradition of victory in the struggle against imperialism and the U.S. and the one of miracles and changes as they paved a new road of advance for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Succession to the leadership and unity has been ensured on the highest level in the DPRK for the past three years which witnessed a fresh turning point in the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK could demonstrate before the whole world the might of socialist Korea creating the highest level of civilization at the fastest speed full of dynamism thanks to the feats Kim Jong Il performed while making high-intensity forced marches day and night for the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people and the shortcut provided by him to effecting surge in all sectors. 
					
					 His behests serve as a militant banner for holding fast to the faith of independence and the principle of self-reliance in the revolution and construction and a banner of prosperity for translating the dream and ideal of the people into shining realities by thoroughly embodying  the popular masses-first idea. 
					
					 His behests also serve as a banner in all fields helping bring about a leap forward and innovations by revolutionary work-style and mental nutrient helping all the service personnel and people become ardent revolutionaries and genuine patriots and perform feats. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will gain strength and courage from the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il in the trying days or glorious days and in good or bad days and dynamically advance along the road of the revolution in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, inspired by his behests.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Taking Issue with DPRK's Nuclear Deterrence
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Taking Issue with DPRK's Nuclear Deterrence 
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its allies vied with each other to cry out for taking "counteractions against missiles of north Korea", echoing the assertions of William Gortney, commander of the U.S. Northern Forces, that north Korea  has already produced smaller nukes and reached the level of tipping indigenous ICBMs with those nukes.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says that the DPRK can never remain a passive onlooker to the propaganda of the U.S. and its allies twisting the nature of the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence and creating impression that it poses a serious "threat" to the world peace.
					
					 It was entirely due to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK that the nuclear issue was spawned on the Korean peninsula and the DPRK had access to nuclear weapons, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the calculation of the U.S. to deploy THAAD in south Korea and revise the U.S.-Japan Defence Cooperation Guidelines as intended by it by hyping the "imminent nuclear threat from north Korea" and the "grave nature" of the situation and put its stooges at odds under its control at the earliest date and use the above-said threat as a stimulus for establishing a system for international cooperation in the campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 Lurking behind this propaganda of the U.S. is a foolish bid to deter the fiction about "nuclear and missile threat from the DPRK" from waning to impair the international prestige of the DPRK and dampen the friendly attitude of the international community towards it. 
					
					 The international community should call into question and build up public opinion on the U.S. nuclear stick for aggression brandished as a tool for high-handed and arbitrary practices against other countries, not on the DPRK's nukes for self-defence. 
					
					 The DPRK will never allow anyone to encroach upon its nuclear sovereignty and fundamental interests.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Worst Human Rights Abuser
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A white policeman mercilessly killed a defenseless black man in South Carolina State of the U.S.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. talks a great deal about "protection of human rights", but it can never cover up its true colors as the world's worst human rights abuser.
					
					 It is not the first time that white policemen killed black men.
					
					 The latest murder of the black man by a white policeman goes to clearly prove that the U.S. is the worst tundra of human rights in the world.
					
					 Not content with the above-said crimes at home, the U.S. makes no scruple of violating human rights in other countries.
					
					 Shortly ago, the Italian Ministry of Justice sentenced two U.S. service members to six years in prison each on charge of raping a 24 years old Romanian woman who was six months pregnant at a local city of Italy in July of last year.
					
					 The U.S. is apt to pull up other countries over their "human rights" issues and dictate them to do this or that whenever it opens its mouth. This clearly proves once again that the U.S. is not a human rights champion but the worst human rights abuser and the cruelest human butcher.
					
					 The U.S. accuses other countries of their "human rights issues," while shelving its own human rights abuses. This is aimed to calm down the international criticism of the human rights abuses in the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. should stop making vain efforts to cover up its crimes and its true colors as the worst human rights abuser through the hypocritical call for "defending human rights" and face the world's stern judgment for its human rights abuses.

articles.title: Papers Rap Park Geun Hye's Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Papers Rap Park Geun Hye's Invectives against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Papers Wednesday in commentaries rap Park Geun Hye's invectives against the DPRK during her visits to Latin American countries for more than ten days from the day marking one year since the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 In a joint press conference held in Colombia she cried out "for sending to the north sustainable strong and united message" that "nukes should not be allowed". In a written interview with a Chilean paper in the country she let loose a spate of rubbish about "dialogue" unbecoming her position, talking about someone's "passive attitude" towards the "Dresden declaration" and calling for "change". In Brazil, too, she made confrontational remarks, vociferating about the nuclear issue and the "human rights" issue.
					
					 These were outbursts let loose by a woman devoid of her own viewpoint as she was accustomed to recklessly accusing others, says Rodong Sinmun. It goes on:
					
					 She should have remained quiet if she had started foreign tour in order to escape the crisis in which she was liable to be impeached more than ten times. She must feel ashamed of talking volumes to slander fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 No matter how desperately the south Korean puppet forces are kicking up a confrontation racket against the DPRK in cooperation with foreign forces, they can never tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK, block all its service personnel and people from dynamically advancing along the road of Juche and Songun and escape the worst crisis.
					
					 The puppet chief executive would be well advised to stop groundlessly accusing others only to become a laughing stock, and mind her own business in south Korea which has turned into mayhem. 
					
					 Minju Joson brands Park as a confrontational maniac without an equal in the world as she made no scruple of hurling mud at the compatriots while making junkets to various countries, utterly indifferent to the angry voices of the south Korean people.

articles.title: "Enforcement Ordinance Bill" of S. Korean Regime Opposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
"Enforcement Ordinance Bill" of S. Korean Regime Opposed in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The chairman and members of the south Korean Committee for the Special Investigation into the Ferry Sewol Disaster launched a stay-in strike in protest against the "enforcement ordinance bill" of the puppet regime at the plaza of Kwanghwamun in Seoul on April 27.
					 Speakers said that the investigation committee was to be formed under the ferry Sewol disaster special law, but it has not yet been formally organized due to the obstruction on the part of the regime.
					
					 Worse still, the present regime announced an "enforcement ordinance bill" in a bid to reduce the special law to a dead paper and block a proper probe into the truth behind the disaster, they held.
					
					 They demanded Park Geun Hye make a bold decision to withdraw the bill as early as possible.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Suppress Actions against Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Suppress Actions against Park Geun Hye
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are frantically suppressing the actions against Park Geun Hye.
					 The fascist police on April 24 walked off members of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy who scattered leaflets demanding the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime while denouncing the puppet forces' misrule during the general strike and demonstration sponsored by the Confederation of Trade Unions.
					
					 The police also perpetrated violence against members of the solidarity who staged a sit-in strike in front of the Namdaemun Police Station in demand of the release of those arrested and walked off them.
					
					 Next day they arrested members of the organization who attempted to enter the building of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency to protest against the police's fascist crackdown and demand the release of those arrested. The police walked off 11 members of the organization for two days.

articles.title: S. Korean Citizen Defends His Righteous Deed
articles.content:
S. Korean Citizen Defends His Righteous Deed
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Jong, representative of the Uri Madang of south Korea, shouted at a trial held on April 23 that his knife attack on Mark Lippert, U.S. ambassador to south Korea, was a praiseworthy deed, terrifying the puppet conservative ruling forces, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Kim declared his deed was righteous because the south Korea-U.S. joint military drills prevented the reunion of divided families and relatives from taking place.

articles.title: Suicide Reported from S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Suicide Reported from S. Korean Puppet Army
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A soldier committed suicide at a unit of the puppet army in Yanggu, south Korean Kangwon Province on April 24, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 It was reported that he hang himself to death, unable to endure the tormenting service in the army.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Censured for Suppressing Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Censured for Suppressing Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A German body and a Venezuelan public figure  protested against the Japanese authorities' crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany noted in a statement on Apr. 20:
					
					 The Japanese police authorities searched the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee without any legal ground.
					
					 The DPRK and Japan at their governmental talks held in Stockholm in May, 2014 agreed to redeem the inglorious past and settle pending issues, according to the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration. The above-said violence perpetrated in the wake of the conclusion of the agreement casts doubt on the Japanese government as it is little short of unilaterally scrapping the agreement.
					
					 The Venezuela-Korea Friendship Society contributed an article to the newspaper El Diario de Lara on Apr. 14, which said:
					
					 Now the Korean people are hardly repressing their anger at the Japanese police authorities' fascist violence and outrageous human rights abuses.
					
					 We appeal to the peace-loving people calling for justice and progress in the world to denounce the Japanese reactionaries' moves against the DPRK and Chongryon and extend unsparing support and solidarity to the Korean people.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked at DPRK Missions Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 They included receptions, friendship meetings, round-table talks, book and photo exhibitions and film shows at the DPRK missions in Romania, Poland, Bulgaria, the Czech Republic, Britain, Italy, France, Switzerland, Germany, Mexico, Venezuela, Brazil, Peru, Egypt, Libya, Nigeria, Algeria, Guinea, Senegal and Angola from April 6 to 15.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Arms of Korea" and "Masikryong Ski Resort."
					
					 Present there on invitation were personages of relevant countries, representations of international and regional bodies and non-governmental organizations, diplomatic envoys and members of organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and Juche idea study groups.
					
					 Staff members of the DPRK missions were on hand.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Foreign Personages
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Meetings, lectures and book and photo exhibitions took place in Romania, Finland, Norway and Germany on April 13 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said that voices of the progressives praising Kim Il Sung growing stronger with the approach of the Day of the Sun help people realize what a great man he was.
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish Communists' League praised Kim Il Sung as an outstanding thinker and theoretician who founded the Juche idea, indicating the road ahead of the Korean people and other progressives of the world and a distinguished leader of the world socialist movement.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Romania, Finland and Norway.

articles.title: Foreign Media Introduce DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Media Introduce DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Media of Myanmar and Vietnam introduced the DPRK on April 14.
					 The newspaper The Global New Light of Myanmar introduced the remodeled May Day Stadium in the DPRK.
					
					 A TV broadcasting service of Myanmar screened a video introducing the Masikryong Ski Resort in the DPRK.
					
					 A Vietnamese internet news posted 29 photos showing monumental edifices including the People's Theatre, Mirim Riding Club, Okryu Children's Hospital and Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the happy life of the Korean people under the title "Pyongyang taking on more beautiful looks with modern structures and large pleasure parks" under the caption of "Beautiful landscape of Capital City Pyongyang."

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a reelecto presidente de Kazajstan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a reelecto presidente de Kazajstan 
						
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 28 un mensaje de felicitacion al reelecto presidente de la Republica de Kazajstan, Nursultan Nazarbayev.
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y la RK se amplien y se desarrollen conforme a la aspiracion de los pueblos de ambos paises, el remitente deseo de todo corazon mayores exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario por la prosperidad del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Acto dedicado a 30o aniversario de publicacion de obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto dedicado a 30o aniversario de publicacion de obra de Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en la Casa Central de Obreros el acto dedicado al 30o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "A proposito de intensificar la direccion partidista sobre la labor de las organizaciones de trabajadores".
					El trabajo, publicado el 30 de abril del 74 (1985) de la Era Juche, dilucida los asuntos fundamentales para convertir las organizaciones de masas en las combativas infinitamente fieles al Partido del Trabajo de Corea y en los ayudantes confiables.
					
					En la ocasion participaron el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Choe Ryong Hae, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Il Hwan, el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang, Kim Su Guil, los funcionarios partidistas de las instituciones del Partido, las organizaciones de trabajadores, ministerios, organos centrales y los municipios, organos, empresas, fabricas y granjas de esta capital, y los maestros, empleados y alumnos de los organos de formacion de funcionarios partidistas.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae dijo en su informe que aunque estaba ocupado por dirigir la revolucion y construccion en conjunto, condujo con energia las organizaciones de las uniones a cumplir excelentemente su mision y deber en el cumplimiento de la causa de la revolucion del Juche, la del Songun al fortalecer la direccion del Partido sobre la labor de las organizaciones de trabajadores.
					
					Prosiguio que la guia del Dirigente se sucede con brillantez gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y la labor arriba mencionada acoge la nueva era dorada de su desarrollo.
					
					Subrayo la necesidad de intensificar continuamente la direccion del Partido sobre la labor en cuestion conforme a la demanda de la epoca y la revolucion en desarrollo y defender firmemente y glorificar las hazanas del Dirigente acumuladas en la historia de la construccion de las organizaciones de trabajadores.

articles.title: Clausurado 30o Festival Nacional de Ciencias y Tecnicas
articles.content:
Clausurado 30o Festival Nacional de Ciencias y Tecnicas
						
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado en esta capital el 30o Festival Nacional de Ciencias y Tecnicas.
					En la ocasion fueron deliberados 550 datos de investigacion cientifica e innovacion tecnica, inclusive los proyectos que permitieron reforzar la agricultura, la ganaderia y la pesca con los recursos y las tecnicas domesticos y aplicar la tecnologia CNC en los equipos y procesos y automatizarlos completamente, asi como los productos sofisticados.
					
					Gozaron de buena reputacion los cientificos y tecnicos de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, la Fabrica de Cemento 618 y otras unidades.
					
					La ceremonia de clausura tuvo lugar el dia 29 en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones.
					
					Estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, el presidente del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnicas, Choe Sang Gon, el presidente del Comite de Educacion, Kim Sung Du, el presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Jang Chol, etc.
					
					La Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias y otras 3 unidades ocuparon el lugar especial.
					
					Y 35 unidades inclusive la Academia de Ciencias Agricolas, el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung, la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Sinuiju obtuvieron el primer lugar.

articles.title: Equipos Rimyongsu y Sobaeksu sobresalen en competencia de futbol de categoria A
articles.content:
Equipos Rimyongsu y Sobaeksu sobresalen en competencia de futbol de categoria A
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo finalizada la primera competencia de futbol de categoria A del Torneo Deportivo por el Premio Mangyongdae que duro casi un mes bajo gran atencion de los aficionados al deporte.
					En el primer torneo de este ano,  sobresalieron el equipo masculino Rimyongsu y el femenino Sobaeksu.
					
					El equipo masculino gano por 2:1 a su rival Sonbong en la semifinal y por 1:0 al otro Kigwancha en la final.
					
					Por otra parte, el equipo Sobaeksu gano por 3:2 y 1:0 a su rival Amnokgang y 25 de Abril en la semifinal y la final, respectivamente.
					
					Segun un hombre relacionado con la asociacion de futbol, la segunda jornada se preve realizar en mayo.
					
					Al terminar la segunda jornada, se publicaran el ranking final, el jugador sobresaliente y el mejor goleador del presente torneo.
